## SamplesAcquired.(constructor)

Constructs a new event object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(deviceUid: string, sampleFormat: SampleFormat, sampleData: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deviceUid | string | a fingerprint reader ID. |
|  sampleFormat | [SampleFormat](./devices.sampleformat.md) | a fingerprint sample format. |
|  sampleData | string | raw sample data received with WebSdk notifiation. |
